name: widgetsjs
description: A tiny library for building websites with a widget based component system

scripts.test: cd test && parcel build components/index.html --public-url . && mocha --require ts-node/register --timeout 999999 **/*.spec.ts && cd .. && npm run clean
scripts.nightly: npm run build && npm run bump-nightly && npm run clean && npm run publish-nightly
scripts.alpha: npm run build && npm run bump-alpha && npm run clean && npm run publish-alpha
scripts.beta: npm run build && npm run bump-beta && npm run clean && npm run publish-beta
scripts.patch: npm run build && npm run bump-patch && npm run clean && npm publish
scripts.minor: npm run build && npm run bump-minor && npm run clean && npm publish
scripts.major: npm run build && npm run bump-major && npm run clean && npm publish
